posts.title: Webassembly struct
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: Webassembly load dynamic libraries
posts.text: Ways to load dynamic librariesThere are two types of shared modules: Main modules, which have system libraries linked in. Side modules, which do not have system libraries linked in. 1.Set dynamicLibrariesinit Module with {dynamicLibraries: [‘A.wasm’,’B.wasm’]} , side modules will be loaded 2 Use LoadDynamicLibraries functionUse Module function “loadDynamicLibrary” to load side module when you need. You need to add “loadDynamicLibrary” in main module’s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS settings to export this function.
